text: Huguang Huiguan (aka Huguang Guild Hall, Lianghu Guild Hall, and Yu King Palace, in Chinese: ) is a guild hall (or assembly hall) in the Yuzhong District. It has many courtyards, gardens, halls, meeting rooms, and theaters. The Huguang Guild Hall was started in 1759. This was during the reign of the Qianlong Emperor in the Qing Dynasty. It is now a museum. ==Other websites== * Category:1759 establishments Category:18th-century establishments in China Category:Museums in China
title: Huguang Huiguan, Chongqing
